alert.note: Alert for Price (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 10 at 6:24PM CDT until July 11 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 700 PM CDT FOR SOUTHERN PRICE COUNTY... At 624 PM CDT, a new severe thunderstorm was located over Hawkins, or 21 miles east of Ladysmith, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Catawba around 640 PM CDT. Ogema and Prentice around 705 PM CDT. Spirit around 725 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kennan, Brantwood, Clifford, Cranberry Lake and Wilson Lake Near Phillips. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
